about.title: WHO AM I ?
about.text2: year old fullstack developer specializing in ReactJs, NextJs, React-Native, NodeJs, AdonisJs and TypeScript programming languages. I always seek to improve my skills and knowledge in programming, working on challenging projects and looking for innovative solutions to complex problems. In addition, I am a dedicated person who is passionate about what I do, always looking to learn and evolve continuously.

contact.title: GET IN TOUCH
contact.text: Hey! My name is Gilberto Fortunato and I'm a software developer. I love working with technology and I'm always looking to update myself and learn new skills. If you're looking for someone to help with your project or simply want to talk about technology, I'd love to speak with you. Get in touch with me through my email or social networks. Let's talk!
